title: Mkt. for good X in Placonia, int'l trade

content.description:
The diagram above shows the domestic supply and demand for good X in the country of Placonia.

If the current world price of good X is Pw, does Placonia export or import good X? Explain.

Given your answer in part (a), indicate the quantity of good X that Placonia exports or imports.

Assume that the government of Placonia imposes a tariff on good X, increasing the price from Pw to Pt.

Using the labels in the graph, indicate the change in each of the following in Placonia.

Consumer surplus

Producer surplus

Indicate how employment in the domestic industry that produces good X is affected by the tariff.
content.question: Respond to all parts of the question.

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
